document.title: Getting Started
document.description: A comprehensive guide to our project

body.raw:
# Project Management Guide

## Project Roadmap ðŸ“‹

### Current Tasks

- [x] Define project scope
- [ ] Design system architecture
- [ ] Conduct initial research
- [x] Schedule kick-off meeting

## Team Collaboration ðŸ¤

### Meeting Notes

| Date       | Topic         | Attendees          | Status    |
| ---------- | ------------- | ------------------ | --------- |
| 2024-01-25 | Kickoff       | @johndoe, @janedoe | Completed |
| 2024-02-01 | Design Review | @teamlead          | Scheduled |

## Important Links

Check out our project resources:

- Website: https://example.com
- Repository: www.github.com/project-repo
- Documentation: https://docs.example.com

## Technical Challenges âš ï¸

We're addressing some key challenges:

~~Initial approach was too complex~~

**New Strategy:**

1. Simplify architecture
2. Modular design
3. Iterative development

## Research Footnotes

Our methodology[^1] focuses on user-centric design.

[^1]: Inspired by lean startup principles and agile methodologies.

## Quick Reference

### Section Linking

You can directly link to this [section](#technical-challenges-) about technical challenges.
